eighth.name: Eighth page ad
eighth.description: Eighth page text-only advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book

quarter.name: Quarter page ad
quarter.description: Quarter page advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book

half.name: Half page ad
half.description: Half page advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book

full_bw.name: Full page b/w ad
full_bw.description: Full page black and white advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book. This ad will be displayed somewhere on the inside part of the ad book (not cover).

full_color.name: Full page color ad
full_color.description: Full page color advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book. This ad will be displayed somewhere on the inside part of the ad book (not cover).

front_inside_cover.name: Front Inside Cover ad
front_inside_cover.description: Full page color advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book. This ad will be displayed on the front inside cover of the book.

back_inside_cover.name: Back Inside Cover ad
back_inside_cover.description: Full page color advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book. This ad will be displayed on the back inside cover of the book.

back_outside_cover.name: Back Outside Cover ad
back_outside_cover.description: Full page color advertisement in Sterling HS Spring Musical ad book. This ad will be displayed on the back outside cover of the book.
